title: Bloomberg Markets: Beardsley on Global Cyberattack
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Beardsley on Global Cyberattack
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Tod Beardsley Director of Research Rapid7 Inc Discussing a cyberattack similar to WannaCry spreading from Europe to the U.S., hitting port operators in New York and Rotterdam, disrupting government systems in Kiev, and disabling operations at companies.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
